philosophy.title: ELEVATE YOUR ENERGY AND INNER STRENGTH.

hero.subtitle: A JOURNEY TO YOUR WELL-BEING AND FITNESS
hero.description:
At Spin8, people are meeting a new community that connects on the same frequency, loves music and movement.

This movement is known worldwide as "wellness clubbing" or "soft clubbing": pop-up social events that bring together rhythm, light, music, and movement. Instead of traditional nightlife, a more conscious, more energetic, and better-feeling alternative is emerging — and Spin8 is at the center of this transformation.

This isn't just cycling…

This is a new generation of night culture.

More conscious, higher frequency, more powerful.

sharedJourney.title: We may have different goals, but we share the same journey.
sharedJourney.description: We inspire and empower you to achieve your fitness and well-being goals through an indoor cycling journey where the momentum, focus, and motivation are all shared in community.

tailoredApproach.title: Tailored Approach
tailoredApproach.description:
At Spin8 Studio, each instructor brings their own unique touch to every class.

Through carefully crafted personal playlists and choreographies, every session has its own special mood and energy.

Whether you want to get swept away by the rhythm of a high-tempo, sweat-inducing ride, or balance your body with a more fluid and rhythmic session… Spin8's variety ensures you'll always find the class that best matches your spirit and energy.

mission.title: MISSION
mission.description: Spin8's mission is to provide a transformative indoor cycling experience that enables people to unlock their potential, overcome their mental barriers, and achieve their goals.

vision.title: VISION
vision.description: Spin8's vision is to be recognized as an inclusive and empowering environment where people can discover their inner strength, embrace wellness culture, and find motivation. Here, everyone feels they belong, meets at the same energy level, and moves forward in the same rhythm.

community.title: COMMUNITY
community.description: The new lifestyle focuses on feeling better. At Spin8, classes transform into an experience that refreshes both body and mind through rhythm, pedals, and high energy. Spin8's goal is to create an inclusive community where everyone can feel comfortable. Whatever your goal may be, we all share the same journey here. Many people now prefer studios where they can move to the rhythm and release stress in environments that make them feel good, rather than going out at night and consuming their energy.

empowerment.title: EMPOWERMENT
empowerment.description: Spin8 offers an environment that creates awareness both mentally and physically. This space creates an experience that motivates you, empowers you, and helps you overcome all obstacles by discovering your own potential. Every class is designed to bring out the strength within you and take you even further.

wellness.title: WELLNESS
wellness.description: We are not all about physical strength, we prioritize the overall wellness of our customers by addressing their mental and emotional well-being through our shared journey.

professionalism.title: PROFESSIONALISM
professionalism.description: At Spin8, all instructors are carefully selected for their professionalism, patience, and supportive approach. Every class is designed so that members can reach their goals safely and with proper guidance.

quotes.bestSelf: THE PATH TO YOUR BEST SELF.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.contact: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us.

section1.title: Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing and using Spin8 Studio's services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

section2.title: Use License
section2.content: Permission is granted to temporarily access the materials on Spin8 Studio's website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title.

section3.title: Membership
section3.content: Membership packages are subject to availability and may be modified or discontinued at any time. All purchases are final unless otherwise stated.

section4.title: Class Bookings
section4.content: Classes must be booked in advance through our booking system. Cancellations must be made at least 12 hours before the scheduled class time to avoid forfeiting credits.

section5.title: Credits and Packages
section5.content: Credits are non-refundable and non-transferable. Package validity periods apply as specified at the time of purchase. Expired credits cannot be reinstated.

section6.title: Health and Safety
section6.content: Participants must inform instructors of any medical conditions, injuries, or limitations before class. Spin8 Studio is not liable for injuries resulting from failure to disclose relevant health information.

section7.title: Age Requirements
section7.content: Participants must be at least 16 years of age. Participants under 18 must have parental consent and supervision.

section8.title: Cancellation Policy
section8.content: Spin8 Studio reserves the right to cancel classes due to unforeseen circumstances. In such cases, credits will be refunded or alternative arrangements will be made.

section9.title: Refund Policy
section9.content: All sales are final. Refunds may be considered on a case-by-case basis for exceptional circumstances, subject to management approval.

section10.title: Code of Conduct
section10.content: All members must respect the studio environment, instructors, and fellow participants. Disruptive behavior may result in removal from class and termination of membership.

section11.title: Personal Belongings
section11.content: Spin8 Studio is not responsible for lost or stolen personal belongings. Lockers are available for use at your own risk.

section12.title: Photography and Media
section12.content: Photography and video recording during classes may be restricted. Spin8 Studio may use photos and videos for promotional purposes unless you opt out in writing.

section13.title: Privacy Policy
section13.content: Your personal information will be handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy. By using our services, you consent to the collection and use of your information as described.

section14.title: Modifications
section14.content: Spin8 Studio reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of services after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

section15.title: Governing Law
section15.content: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Turkey. Any disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of Turkish courts.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Spin8 Studio
faq.contact: Still have questions? Contact us and we'll be happy to help!

q1.question: What should I bring to my first class?
q1.answer: Please bring a water bottle, a towel, and wear comfortable workout clothes. We provide cycling shoes, but you're welcome to bring your own if you prefer.

q2.question: Do I need to book classes in advance?
q2.answer: Yes, we recommend booking classes in advance through our online system to secure your spot. Classes can fill up quickly, especially during peak hours.

q3.question: What is the cancellation policy?
q3.answer: You can cancel your class booking up to 12 hours before the scheduled time without losing your credit. Cancellations made less than 12 hours before class will result in credit forfeiture.

q4.question: Are there different difficulty levels?
q4.answer: Our classes are designed to accommodate all fitness levels. Instructors provide modifications and encourage you to work at your own pace. Each class can be adjusted to your fitness level.

q5.question: How do credits work?
q5.answer: Credits are used to book classes. Different packages offer different numbers of credits. Credits are valid for a specific period as stated in your package terms.

q6.question: Can I transfer my credits to someone else?
q6.answer: No, credits are non-transferable and tied to your account. They cannot be shared or transferred to other members.

q7.question: What happens if I'm late to class?
q7.answer: If you arrive more than 5 minutes late, your spot may be given to someone on the waitlist. We recommend arriving 10-15 minutes early to set up your bike.

q8.question: Do you offer trial classes?
q8.answer: Yes, we offer trial classes for first-time visitors. Please contact us to schedule your trial class and experience what Spin8 has to offer.

q9.question: What age do I need to be to participate?
q9.answer: Participants must be at least 16 years old. Participants under 18 require parental consent and may need supervision depending on the circumstances.

q10.question: How do I purchase a package?
q10.answer: You can purchase packages through our website's pricing page. Simply select the package that suits you, add any coupon codes if applicable, and complete your purchase. You'll receive credits immediately after payment.

collection.title: 3. What data do we collect when you visit the site?
collection.p1: When you browse this site, we automatically collect certain information through cookies, similar tools, and tracking technologies. The main types of data that may be recorded include:

list.technical: Technical and browsing information: IP address, identifiers of the device in use, information about the browser and operating system, date and time of access, pages visited, technical commands necessary for proper content display, system errors.
list.preferences: User preferences: choices made regarding cookies and privacy settings, collected via panels, banners, or similar tools.
list.stats: Aggregated and anonymous statistics: information used to assess and improve the functioning of the site, such as visit frequency or most viewed areas.

types.title: 4. What types of cookies (and similar tools) exist?
types.p1: To provide you with a better browsing experience, we may use different categories of cookies and similar technologies:

list.necessary: Strictly necessary cookies: essential for the technical functioning of the site; for example, they allow access to protected areas, session management, or remembering essential preferences.
list.preferences: Preference and personalization cookies: used to store display choices such as language to offer an interaction closer to your preferences.
list.analytics: Analytics and performance cookies: help us better understand how people use the site by collecting anonymized and aggregated data on traffic and usage.

consent.title: 5. How can you give or refuse consent?
consent.p1: On first access to the site, a banner is displayed that allows you to manage preferences related to cookies and tracking tools. Currently, we prioritize strictly necessary cookies and analytics that respect user privacy. You can manage your browser settings to block or delete cookies at any time, though this may affect site functionality.

protection.title: 6. How are your data protected?
protection.p1: Personal data collected through this site are processed mainly with electronic and digital tools according to the principles of lawfulness, fairness, data minimization, integrity, and confidentiality.

rights.title: 7. What are your rights regarding the data collected?
rights.p1: The user has the right to:

list.rectification: Request rectification, updating, or deletion of data.
list.access: Obtain confirmation and access to personal data.
list.restriction: Request restriction of or object to processing.

rights.p2: To exercise these rights, please contact us via our contact page.

This notice is addressed to anyone who accesses or uses this site, describing how users’ personal data are collected, used and protected, as well as the rights granted by law.

Spin8 Studio
Kadınlar Denizi, 14. Sk., 09400 Kuşadası/Aydın

section3.title: 3. On what legal bases do we process your data?
section3.content: The processing of personal data collected through this site (including via cookies, similar technologies, contact forms, restricted areas, digital services and transactions, where applicable) is based on one or more of the following legal bases:
list: Performance of a service/pre-contractual measures requested by the user through the provided contact forms;
Compliance with legal, regulatory or statutory obligations;

An additional legal basis, the legitimate interest of the Controller, may be used for specific purposes (e.g., ensuring IT security, preventing fraud, protecting the Controller’s rights in legal proceedings).
section3.footer: Failure to give or withdrawal of consent may reduce or limit certain functionalities or personalized services.

section4.title: 4. What data do we collect when you visit the site?
section4.content: While browsing this site, the following data may be collected—also via cookies and similar technologies such as pixel tags, web beacons, local storage and equivalent technologies:
list: **Browsing and technical data:** information such as IP address, device identifiers, operating system and browser data, requested URLs, connection times, technical logs, technical preferences, usage data collected via cookies and tracking technologies (pixel tags, web beacons, local storage and equivalent tools).

**Data communicated via social integrations and third-party platforms:** data transmitted through social features (login, plugins, shares, etc.), processed in accordance with the rules of the respective platforms as well as this notice.

section5.title: 5. How do we process your data, how do we protect it, and how long do we keep it?
section5.content:
Personal data collected through this site are processed mainly with electronic and digital tools in accordance with the principles of lawfulness, fairness, data minimization, integrity, and confidentiality.
Data are retained according to the following timelines:
list: **Cookie preferences and consents:** retained for 180 days, as per the Cookie Policy on this site.
**Browsing and technical data:** retained only for the time necessary to ensure the security, integrity and functionality of the site and subsequently anonymized or aggregated.
**Data collected for contractual and transactional purposes:** retained for the time required by applicable laws (for example, tax or accounting laws).
**Data processed for marketing purposes:** retained until consent is withdrawn or deletion is requested.
**Data entered via forms or specific requests:** retained for the time necessary to respond or fulfil the related purpose.

section6.title: 6. Who may receive your data?
section6.content: The personal data collected through this site may be accessed, within the limits of their respective responsibilities and purposes, by:
list: Internal subjects authorized by the Controller, duly trained in privacy and security matters;

Suppliers and third parties appointed as Processors (for example: technical providers, IT companies, customer support companies, consultants, payment service providers and logistics providers, where applicable);
Business partners, third parties and affiliates, exclusively for promotional/marketing purposes if you have given specific consent or exercised opt-out where provided;

Providers of plugins, social networks and services for interaction with external platforms, which may process personal data according to their own logic as independent controllers (please refer in that case also to the individual privacy notices of such third parties);
Competent public authorities and supervisory bodies, within the limits imposed by law or to comply with requests from judicial authorities;
section6.footer: The updated list of external recipients can be made available upon request by writing to the Controller’s contacts.

section7.title: 7. Where can your data be transferred?
section7.content: Personal data collected through this site may be processed and transferred—for the purposes indicated—to the following countries:
list: to countries belonging to the European Economic Area (EEA), Switzerland or other countries recognized by the competent authorities as providing an “adequate” level of protection required by law;

section8.title: 8. What are your rights regarding the data collected?
section8.content: The user, based on applicable law, has the right to:
list: Obtain confirmation as to whether or not personal data concerning them are being processed and, where that is the case, access such data and related information (right of access).
Request the rectification, update or deletion of inaccurate data or data that are no longer necessary (right to rectification and erasure).
Request restriction of processing or object to the processing of data, including for promotional/profiling purposes, where provided.
Request data portability in a structured and interoperable format (where technically feasible).
Withdraw consent given to the use of non-technical cookies and to the processing of data collected through tracking tools.
Report any irregularities or abuses to the competent supervisory authorities.
section8.footer: To exercise these rights, simply send a request to the Controller’s contacts, who will respond within the timeframes provided by the applicable local regulation.

section9.title: 9. How are minors’ data processed?
section9.content:
The protection of minors is a fundamental priority.
The services and content of this site are not intended for individuals under 18 years of age.
We do not knowingly collect personal data of minors without the verifiable consent of a parent or legal guardian.
If a parent or guardian believes that a minor has provided personal data without authorization, they may request its removal, update, or restriction of processing by writing to the contacts indicated in this notice.

section10.title: 10. How to make reports or complaints to the authorities?
section10.content: If you believe that the processing of your personal data through this site does not comply with applicable law, you may lodge a complaint free of charge with the competent supervisory authorities, including:
list: The Data Protection Authority of your country of citizenship or residence;
European Data Protection Supervisor

changes.title: How will we inform you about changes to this notice?
changes.content: This notice is subject to periodic review due to regulatory updates or changes to the services offered through the site. Any significant change will be communicated on this page.
